Class SelectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • EventHandler<SelectionPage>
      • SelectionHandler

  • public class SelectionHandler
extends EventHandler<SelectionPage>

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SelectionHandler getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of the SelectionHandler.
        Returns:
        the SelectionHandler instance

      • start

        public void start(Action action)
        Handles the start action when the ENTER key is pressed. It stops the current music, sets the new media component for the page, sets the selected background and cursor images for the LevelPage, and plays the new media component. Finally, it navigates to Level1.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to handle

      • exit

        public void exit(Action<SelectionPage> action)
        Handles the exit action when the ESCAPE key is pressed. It navigates back to the main menu page and resets the selection page.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to handle

      • nextBg

        public void nextBg(Action action)
        Handles the action when the RIGHT arrow key is pressed. It updates the background image component to the next image.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to handle

      • beforeBg

        public void beforeBg(Action action)
        Handles the action when the LEFT arrow key is pressed. It updates the background image component to the previous image.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to handle

      • nextCursor

        public void nextCursor(Action action)
        Handles the action when the UP arrow key is pressed. It updates the cursor image component to the next image.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to handle

      • beforeCursor

        public void beforeCursor(Action action)
        Handles the action when the DOWN arrow key is pressed. It updates the cursor image component to the previous image.
        Parameters:
        action - the action to handle
